TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Validation extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Excludes fields of the Request object from being checked for potentially unsafe HTML markup and client script.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Web.Helpers.UnvalidatedRequestValues Unvalidated(class System.Web.HttpRequest request) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Unvalidated (request As HttpRequest) As UnvalidatedRequestValues

Docs.param: The object that contains values to exclude from request validation.
Docs.summary: Returns a version of form values, cookies, and query-string variables without checking them first for HTML markup and client script.
Docs.returns: An object that contains unvalidated versions of the form and query-string values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Web.Helpers.UnvalidatedRequestValues Unvalidated(class System.Web.HttpRequestBase request) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Unvalidated (request As HttpRequestBase) As UnvalidatedRequestValues

Docs.param: The object that contains values to exclude from validation.
Docs.summary: Returns all values from the Request object (including form fields, cookies, and the query string) without checking them first for HTML markup and client script.
Docs.returns: An object that contains unvalidated versions of the form, cookie, and query-string values.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Unvalidated (this System.Web.HttpRequest request, string key);
.method public static hidebysig string Unvalidated(class System.Web.HttpRequest request, string key) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Unvalidated (request As HttpRequest, key As String) As String
static member Unvalidated : System.Web.HttpRequest * string -> string

Docs.param: The object that contains values to exclude from validation.
The name of the field to exclude from validation. can refer to a form field, to a cookie, or to the query-string variable.
Docs.summary: Returns a value from the specified form field, cookie, or query-string variable without checking it first for HTML markup and client script.
Docs.returns: A string that contains unvalidated text from the specified field, cookie, or query-string value.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string Unvalidated (this System.Web.HttpRequestBase request, string key);
.method public static hidebysig string Unvalidated(class System.Web.HttpRequestBase request, string key) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function Unvalidated (request As HttpRequestBase, key As String) As String
static member Unvalidated : System.Web.HttpRequestBase * string -> string

Docs.param: The object that contains values to exclude from validation.
The name of the field to exclude from validation. can refer to a form field, to a cookie, or to the query-string variable.
Docs.summary: Returns the specified value from the Request object without checking it first for HTML markup and client script.
Docs.returns: A string that contains unvalidated text from the specified field, cookie, or query-string value.
